titleStmt.author: 宋 法賢譯

availability.p: Available for non-commercial use when distributed with this header intact.

projectDesc.p: Text as provided by Mr. Hsiao Chen-Kuo, Tripitaka Koreana as provided by Mr. Christian Wittern, Text as provided by SAT, Japan, Text as provided by Anonymous from USA, Punctuated text as provided by Mr. Li Ming-Fang
